summary: This is a memorandum from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York dated August 12, 2019, documenting information passed from a Special Housing Unit member on August 9, 2019. It notes that inmate Jeffrey Epstein was expected to return from an attorney visit and would need a cellmate upon arrival.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Identified as inmate #76318-054 at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, mentioned as needing a cellmate upon return from an attorney visit.

events.title: Information Passed Regarding Epstein's Return
events.description: At approximately 1:50 p.m., information was passed from a Special Housing Unit member that inmate Jeffrey Epstein was going to an attorney visit and would need a cellmate upon his return.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, New York
keyFacts: The document is dated August 12, 2019, and references events from August 9, 2019.
It states that inmate Jeffrey Epstein (#76318-054) was going to an attorney visit and was expected to return.
The memorandum indicates that Epstein would need a cellmate upon his return from the visit.
The information was passed from a Special Housing Unit member to shift staff.
The document originates from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, where Epstein was held.
